short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enforces the location filter on Facebook Marketplace, showing only listings from your selected area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enforces the location filter on Facebook Marketplace, showing only listings from your selected area.
